text.value: Has experienced any difficulty breathing or breathing fast?
Has suffered from loss of consciousness?
Refer to visit a health facility immediately
Refer to visit a health facility immediately
For how long has been experiencing diarrhoea?
Is able to eat and drink?
How long has the child had a fever?
Refer to visit a health facility immediately
Has the mosquito net been treated?
Educate the caregiver on the benefits of sleeping under a mosquito net especially for children under the age of five then recommend they buy the nets
Is sleeping under a mosquito net?
Recommend that the caregiver get a treated mosquito net to help prevent malaria
Has travelled to or lived in an area where malaria is prevalent (eg lake region or the coast)?
For how long has been experiencing vomiting?
Refer to visit a health facility immediately
Be sure you submit to complete this action
Follow up Task
Please refer to health facility immediately
Follow up task will appear in 3 days
travelled to a malaria prone area

bind.calculate: selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/diarrhoea , 'yes') or selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/consciousness_loss , 'yes') or selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/child_vomiting , 'yes') or selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/child_fever , 'yes') or selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/sleeping_under_net , 'no')

if((selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/diarrhoea , 'yes') or selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/consciousness_loss , 'yes') or selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/child_vomiting , 'yes') or selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/child_fever , 'yes') or selected( /children_under_assessment/children_under_assessment/sleeping_under_net , 'no')),'Yes','No')
